= camel config

Get and set user configuration values


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel config [options]
----


== Subcommands

[cols="2,5",options="header"]
|===
| Subcommand | Description
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-config-get.adoc[get] | Display user configuration value
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-config-list.adoc[list] | Displays user configuration
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-config-set.adoc[set] | Set user configuration value
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-config-unset.adoc[unset] | Remove user configuration value
|===



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
